text: Enceladus mooy mbir mi gëna mëna wéyal leeraay ci jànt bi ak liko wër, ndax dafay wéyale 90% ci leeraaru jant bi muy jot.
translated_text:
Wolof: Enceladus mooy mbir mi gëna mëna wéyal leeraay ci jànt bi ak liko wër, ndax dafay wéyale 90% ci leeraaru jant bi muy jot. 
English: Enceladus is the most reflective object in the solar system, reflecting about 90% of the sunlight that hits it.

text: Mënu ñu gis dara ludul asamaan su leer te rafet ci kaw ak montaañ yu bari yuñu wër. Tuuti ci addina bi lañuy mëna gis mbaa dégg ci biir kaaf bi.
translated_text:
Wolof: Mënu ñu gis dara ludul asamaan su leer te rafet ci kaw ak montaañ yu bari yuñu wër. Tuuti ci addina bi lañuy mëna gis mbaa dégg ci biir kaaf bi. 
English: You can't see the sun from space because it's so far away. The sun is so big that most of the Earth is darkened by it.

text: Pur fi niu nek nii sapong.Sapong defa nekon il kom Britanik rek.
translated_text:
Wolof: Pur fi niu nek nii sapong.Sapong defa nekon il kom Britanik rek. 
English: Yes, I know. Japan is like Britain.

text: Ci cappandaw ga, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, tuddé bénn saggu xobu garab ci lakku Maldives yi, yéggna ci ngélaw wu 240 kilometers ci bénn waxtu ( 149 miles ci bénn waxtu) .
translated_text:
Wolof: Ci cappandaw ga, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, tuddé bénn saggu xobu garab ci lakku Maldives yi, yéggna ci ngélaw wu 240 kilometers ci bénn waxtu ( 149 miles ci bénn waxtu). 
English: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a type of sea snail, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour).

text: Bërëbu Turkey, bokk na ci lakes, jeelna 783 562 kilometres kaare (300 948 sq mi), bi nga xamni 755,688 kilometres kaare (291 773 sq mi) ñoo ngi ci wozz xarfu Asia ak 23 764 kaare kilometres (9 174 sq mi) ci Ërop.
translated_text:
Wolof: Bërëbu Turkey, bokk na ci lakes, jeelna 783 562 kilometres kaare (300 948 sq mi), bi nga xamni 755,688 kilometres kaare (291 773 sq mi) ñoo ngi ci wozz xarfu Asia ak 23 764 kaare kilometres (9 174 sq mi) ci Ërop. 
English: Turkey's surface area, including lakes, is 783,562 kilometres square (300,948 sq mi), of which 755,688 kilometres square (291,773 sq mi) are in Asia and 23,764 kilometres square (9,174 sq mi) in Europe.

text: South Shetland Islands, te ñu gis leen ci atum 1819, réew yu bari ñu ngi naan ñoo ko moom. Dun yo yu ño eup base ci aduna bi, te ci atum 2020 amna ci fukk ak juróom benn yuy dox.
translated_text:
Wolof: South Shetland Islands, te ñu gis leen ci atum 1819, réew yu bari ñu ngi naan ñoo ko moom. Dun yo yu ño eup base ci aduna bi, te ci atum 2020 amna ci fukk ak juróom benn yuy dox. 
English: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations. The largest is the Argentine Republic, with sixteen bases in 2020.

text: Aapia mooy kapitalu Samoa. Dëkk bi dafa nekk ci dun bu Upolu te am ay nit yu neew 40.000.
translated_text:
Wolof: Aapia mooy kapitalu Samoa. Dëkk bi dafa nekk ci dun bu Upolu te am ay nit yu neew 40.000. 
English: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The city is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.

text: Ndéémngélaw bi sorina landfull, dina jafe ngir yéksi United States wala Caribbean.
translated_text:
Wolof: Ndéémngélaw bi sorina landfull, dina jafe ngir yéksi United States wala Caribbean. 
English: The storm is far from landfall, so it will be difficult to assess the impact on the United States or Caribbean.

text: Ci suufu maria la gëna woyofee, gëna dijj ci kaw plateau yi.
translated_text:
Wolof: Ci suufu maria la gëna woyofee, gëna dijj ci kaw plateau yi. 
English: It is thinner under maria and thicker under highlands.

text: Waaye nak, àll yi nekku ñu ay pàcc yu bari lool ay mangroves – amaale na itam ay garab yu mag yu daan tax ñuy wax màndingue bu am doole fees dell ak ay garab.
translated_text:
Wolof: Waaye nak, àll yi nekku ñu ay pàcc yu bari lool ay mangroves – amaale na itam ay garab yu mag yu daan tax ñuy wax màndingue bu am doole fees dell ak ay garab. 
English: But, there are still many large areas of mangroves - some of them are very large forests that are still standing and producing a lot of mangrove trees.

text: Gëstu bu mag ci kartu yëngu-yëngu suuf ci Sewolosi bu Etaa Sini wone na ni amul benn yëngu-yëngu suuf ci Icelànd ci ayu-bis bi jiitu.
translated_text:
Wolof: Gëstu bu mag ci kartu yëngu-yëngu suuf ci Sewolosi bu Etaa Sini wone na ni amul benn yëngu-yëngu suuf ci Icelànd ci ayu-bis bi jiitu. 
English: The US Geological Survey satellite image showed no earthquake activity in Iceland in the week prior.

text: Nekk c kaw benn ci tund yi ci bët gannaaru Makka, kaaf bi dafa sori addina.
translated_text:
Wolof: Nekk c kaw benn ci tund yi ci bët gannaaru Makka, kaaf bi dafa sori addina. 
English: The highest mountain in the world is Mount Everest in the Himalayas.
